preterite.spanish: Me preocupé mucho cuando no llegaste a casa.
preterite.english: I worried a lot when you didn't come home.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Te preocupaste demasiado por el examen final.
preterite.english: You worried too much about the final exam.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Te preocupaste por tu hermano durante su enfermedad.
preterite.english: You worried about your brother during his illness.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Se preocupó por la salud de sus padres ancianos.
preterite.english: He/She worried about his/her elderly parents' health.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Nos preocupamos por el futuro de la empresa.
preterite.english: We worried about the company's future.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Os preocupasteis por los resultados del proyecto.
preterite.english: You all worried about the project results.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Se preocuparon por la seguridad del barrio.
preterite.english: They worried about neighborhood safety.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Me preocuparé menos cuando tengas trabajo estable.
future.english: I will worry less when you have stable work.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Te preocuparás por tus hijos cuando sean adolescentes.
future.english: You will worry about your children when they're teenagers.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Te preocuparás por el clima durante las vacaciones.
future.english: You will worry about the weather during vacation.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Se preocupará por la jubilación en unos años.
future.english: He/She will worry about retirement in a few years.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Nos preocuparemos por el medio ambiente del futuro.
future.english: We will worry about the future environment.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Os preocuparéis por vuestros nietos cuando nazcan.
future.english: You all will worry about your grandchildren when they're born.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Se preocuparán por la tecnología y la privacidad.
future.english: They will worry about technology and privacy.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Me divertí muchísimo en la fiesta de cumpleaños.
preterite.english: I had a great time at the birthday party.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Te divertiste mucho en el parque de diversiones.
preterite.english: You had a lot of fun at the amusement park.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Te divertiste bailando tango en la milonga.
preterite.english: You had fun dancing tango at the milonga.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Se divirtió jugando con sus nietos en el jardín.
preterite.english: He/She had fun playing with his/her grandchildren in the garden.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Nos divertimos explorando la ciudad antigua.
preterite.english: We had fun exploring the old city.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Os divertisteis cantando karaoke hasta muy tarde.
preterite.english: You all had fun singing karaoke until very late.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Se divirtieron nadando en la piscina del hotel.
preterite.english: They had fun swimming in the hotel pool.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Me divertiré mucho en las vacaciones de verano.
future.english: I will have a lot of fun on summer vacation.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Te divertirás aprendiendo a tocar la guitarra.
future.english: You will have fun learning to play guitar.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Te divertirás conociendo Buenos Aires de noche.
future.english: You will have fun getting to know Buenos Aires at night.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Se divertirá mucho en su primer viaje a Europa.
future.english: He/She will have a lot of fun on his/her first trip to Europe.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Nos divertiremos cocinando juntos el fin de semana.
future.english: We will have fun cooking together on the weekend.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Os divertiréis muchísimo en el festival de música.
future.english: You all will have a great time at the music festival.
future.subject: vosotros

future.spanish: Se divertirán practicando deportes acuáticos.
future.english: They will have fun practicing water sports.
future.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

preterite.spanish: Me encontré con mi profesor de la escuela primaria.
preterite.english: I ran into my elementary school teacher.
preterite.subject: yo

preterite.spanish: Te encontraste muy bien después de las vacaciones.
preterite.english: You felt very well after vacation.
preterite.subject: tú

preterite.spanish: Te encontraste con tu ex novio en el supermercado.
preterite.english: You ran into your ex-boyfriend at the supermarket.
preterite.subject: vos

preterite.spanish: Se encontró perdido en la ciudad nueva.
preterite.english: He/She found himself/herself lost in the new city.
preterite.subject: él/ella/usted

preterite.spanish: Nos encontramos por casualidad en el aeropuerto.
preterite.english: We ran into each other by chance at the airport.
preterite.subject: nosotros

preterite.spanish: Os encontrasteis muy cansados después del viaje.
preterite.english: You all found yourselves very tired after the trip.
preterite.subject: vosotros

preterite.spanish: Se encontraron con dificultades inesperadas en el proyecto.
preterite.english: They encountered unexpected difficulties in the project.
preterite.subject: ellos/ellas/ustedes

future.spanish: Me encontraré mejor después del tratamiento médico.
future.english: I will feel better after medical treatment.
future.subject: yo

future.spanish: Te encontrarás con muchas oportunidades en la nueva ciudad.
future.english: You will encounter many opportunities in the new city.
future.subject: tú

future.spanish: Te encontrarás con viejos amigos en la reunión.
future.english: You will meet old friends at the reunion.
future.subject: vos

future.spanish: Se encontrará muy feliz en su nuevo trabajo.
future.english: He/She will find himself/herself very happy in his/her new job.
future.subject: él/ella/usted

future.spanish: Nos encontraremos en una situación muy diferente.
future.english: We will find ourselves in a very different situation.
future.subject: nosotros

future.spanish: Os encontraréis con sorpresas agradables en el viaje.
future.english: You all will encounter pleasant surprises on the trip.

future.spanish: Se encontrarán con nuevos desafíos en el mercado internacional.
